author: spiroid
name: Faience
description:
I take no credit for this theme, it was originally made for Gnome Shell 3.2 by tiheum.

It was my favorite theme for a long time, but It seems that he didn't have the time to make it evolve to Gnome Shell 3.4 nor to Cinnamon.

Important note: Tiheum made a new theme version, which was adapted to Cinnamon by the famous bimsebasse :) and can be downloaded here: Faience+ 1.0

Theme elements

  • Font: Aurulent Sens
  • Icons: Faience icon set
  • GTK/window theme: Zukitwo by lassekongo83
  • Wallpaper: Blue and Green by Zim2687
     

Changelog

v1.1.1

  • A small fix which reduces the search field width

v1.1

  • Cinnamon 1.6  support
  • Ripple image updated
  • Checkbox and radiobutton added
     

Original theme updates

Additions to the original theme:

  • Cinnamon overview specific parts (add / remove workspace / workspace name selector, etc.)
  • Cinnamon menu (popup-menu)

Modifications:

  • Calendar's look update

 

Installation instructions

Please see the github repository homepage for how to install the theme with the recommanded GTK3 theme, font and background image.
